Title: Jeffie Was Here
Writer: Todd Edwards (screenplay), Peter Bedgood (screenplay), Todd Edwards (story)
Actors: Ken Marino, Jennifer Wenger, Steve Little, Cristine Rose
Plot: It's been a rough couple of years for Alan Mangold, a tightly-wound professor in his 30's who dreams of a better life beyond his shoebox apartment... if only he could complete his opus, "...
